subject: ETA for shipment SHP-101
body: Please confirm ETA for SHP-101 to Dallas today.

subject: Delay on container CNTR-882
body: Container appears delayed at port and customer is waiting.

subject: Missing customs document for AWB-9921
body: Need updated commercial invoice and declaration form.

subject: Rate request LAX to ORD
body: Can you share spot rate for 2 pallets pickup tomorrow.

subject: Coordinate pickup with warehouse
body: Please coordinate driver slot with warehouse team for 14:00.

subject: Tracking status for SHP-101
body: Where is the shipment now and expected arrival time.

subject: Urgent: missed delivery window
body: Delivery missed cutoff and SLA may be breached. Need update ASAP.

subject: POD request for INV-553
body: Please send POD and signed delivery note.

subject: ETA update needed
body: Customer waiting for ETA confirmation before unloading.

subject: Invoice discrepancy on shipment 7782
body: Charge appears higher than quote; please review pricing.

subject: Driver delayed due to traffic
body: Pickup likely late by 2 hours.

subject: Internal handover for evening shift
body: Please hand over open exceptions to evening ops team.

subject: Rate quote request - urgent
body: Need urgent quote for same-day move.

subject: Shipment stuck at terminal
body: Shipment is stuck and detention risk starts today.

subject: Need packing list correction
body: Please reissue packing list with updated HS code.

subject: Status update request
body: Can you provide latest tracking and delivery ETA.

subject: Temperature excursion exception
body: Temperature excursion detected; escalate and confirm next steps.

subject: Customs paperwork follow-up
body: Need copy of permit and customs declaration.

subject: Pricing clarification for lane NYC-ATL
body: Please confirm surcharge and final rate.

subject: Arrange pickup change
body: Please arrange pickup at alternate dock and coordinate with dispatch.
